title: Tab {{index}}
desc: Tabs keeps related content in a single container that is shown and hidden through navigation.
usage_desc: Do not display too many tabs at a time, user cannot remember more than 7-9 names. Collapse the rest of the tabs into "..." more action.
card_desc: Tabs are styled as cards. Choose a card-style tab according to your page layout.
vertical_desc: Vertical tabs are the tabs arranged on the left in a vertical space, instead of on the top in a horizontal space.
